price: Àwa l’A ṣẹ̀dá wọn. A sì ṣe ìṣẹ̀dá wọn dáradára. Nígbà tí A bá sì fẹ́, A óò fi irú wọn pààrọ̀ wọn ní ti ìpààrọ̀.
arabic: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu khalaqnāhum washadadnā asrahum wa-idhā shi'nā baddalnā amthālahum tabdīlan
